Name: Candy Monsters
About the game: Candy Monsters is a fantastic puzzle combined game full of excitement and joy! Explore the scary candy maps, helping A Mumia franklin A Coledar everyone so that your grandmother doesn't discover new and delicious adventures! Game: - Excellent delicious and addictive gameplay - Hundreds of challenging and unique match-3 levels - Phases with time, ice, fire, chocolate, etc ..... - Different models of candy colors... - Fire Bat Boosters help and crush candy -Ghost boosters to mix candy -Ax Boosters for Candy Crushing -More than 500 Exciting Phases - No Wi-Fi or internet connection required to play - Hundreds of best levels according to the rules for your entertainment - In 4 languages ​​​​English, Portuguese, Russian, Chinese .... More languages ​​​​to be added Candy Monsters
